analyzer/src/muSC_muPC/MMuPC1AnalysisC.cpp

00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003   Name:         MMuPC1AnalysisC.cpp
00004   Created by:   Tom Banks
00005 
00006   Contents:     Generates muPC1 histograms.  The "successive tdiff" 
00007                 histograms are particularly useful for determining
00008                 the afterpulse-clustering intervals in the subsequent
00009                 MQL module.
00010                 
00011 \********************************************************************/
00012                                                         
00013 /*-- Include files -------------------------------------------------*/
00014

00019 /* MIDAS includes */
00020 #include "midas.h"

00023 #include "TH1.h"
00024 #include "TH2.h"
00025 #include "TH3.h"
00026

00028 #include "common.h"
00029 #include "ucb_common.h"

00032 
00033 /*-- Static parameters ---------------------------------------------*/
00034 
00035 // Declare histograms
00036 static TH2 *muPC1_Xwire_successive_tdiffs;
00037 static TH2 *muPC1_XwireVStime_2D;
00038 static TH2 *muPC1_Ywire_successive_tdiffs;
00039 static TH2 *muPC1_YwireVStime_2D;

00059 /*-- init routine --------------------------------------------------*/
00060 
00061 INT MMuPC1AnalysisC_init(void)
00062 {
00063   /****** Construct histograms ******/
00064   char hist_name[256];
00065   char hist_title[256];
00066 
00067   // muPC1 Xwire histograms
00068   sprintf(hist_name,  "muPC1_X_raw_successive_tdiffs");
00069   sprintf(hist_title, "Tdiffs between successive raw #muPC1 Xwire hits");
00070   muPC1_Xwire_successive_tdiffs = new TH2D(hist_name, hist_title, 1451, -252.5, 7002.5, kMuPC1NumXWires, 0.5, (kMuPC1NumXWires+0.5));
00071   /*
00072   sprintf(hist_name,  "muPC1_XwireVStime_2D");
00073   sprintf(hist_title, "#muPC1 raw Xwire hits vs.time 2D");
00074   muPC1_XwireVStime_2D = new TH2D(hist_name, hist_title, 1000, 0, 50000000, kMuPC1NumXWires, 0.5, (kMuPC1NumXWires+0.5));
00075   */
00076 
00077   // muPC1 Ywire histograms
00078   sprintf(hist_name,  "muPC1_Y_raw_successive_tdiffs");
00079   sprintf(hist_title, "Tdiffs between successive raw #muPC1 Ywire hits");
00080   muPC1_Ywire_successive_tdiffs = new TH2D(hist_name, hist_title, 1451, -252.5, 7002.5, kMuPC1NumYWires, 0.5, (kMuPC1NumYWires+0.5));
00081   /*
00082   sprintf(hist_name,  "muPC1_YwireVStime_2D");
00083   sprintf(hist_title, "#muPC1 raw Ywire hits vs.time 2D");
00084   muPC1_YwireVStime_2D = new TH2D(hist_name, hist_title, 1000, 0, 50000000, kMuPC1NumYWires, 0.5, (kMuPC1NumYWires+0.5));
00085   */
00086 
00087   return SUCCESS;
00088 }
00089 
00090 /*-- event routine -------------------------------------------------*/
00091 
00092 INT MMuPC1AnalysisC(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00093 {
00094   /* ############################################### */
00095   // Open up the bank "HITS" (contains CAEN & COMP hits by parameter #)
00096   channel_hit *hit_bank;
00097   int hit_bank_size = bk_locate(pevent, "HITS", (DWORD *) &hit_bank);
00098   hit_bank_size = hit_bank_size * sizeof(DWORD) / sizeof(channel_hit);
00099   if(hit_bank == NULL) {
00100     fprintf(stderr, "MMuPC1AnalysisC: Could not find bank HITS.\n");
00101     return !SUCCESS;
00102   }
00103 
00104   /* ############################################### */
00105 
00106   // Initialize the "previous hit" indices
00107   int prev_hit_index_muPC1_Xwire[kMuPC1NumXWires+1];
00108   for (int j=1; j<=kMuPC1NumXWires; j++) {
00109     prev_hit_index_muPC1_Xwire[j] = -1;
00110   }
00111   int prev_hit_index_muPC1_Ywire[kMuPC1NumYWires+1];
00112   for (int j=1; j<=kMuPC1NumYWires; j++) {
00113     prev_hit_index_muPC1_Ywire[j] = -1;
00114   }
00115 
00116   // Loop over hits within hit_bank and fill muPC1 raw data histograms
00117   for (int i=0; i<hit_bank_size; i++) {
00118     int par = hit_bank[i].parameter;
00119 
00120     // Xwires
00121     if ((par >= 4001) && (par <= (4000+kMuPC1NumXWires))) {
00122       int wire = (par-4000);
00123       // tdiffs between successive Xwire hits, per wire
00124       if (prev_hit_index_muPC1_Xwire[wire] >= 0) {
00125         muPC1_Xwire_successive_tdiffs->Fill((hit_bank[i].time -
00126                                              hit_bank[prev_hit_index_muPC1_Xwire[wire]].time),
00127                                             wire);
00128       }
00129       prev_hit_index_muPC1_Xwire[wire] = i;
00130       // 2D Xwire hits vs. time
00131       //      muPC1_XwireVStime_2D->Fill(hit_bank[i].time, wire);
00132     }
00133 
00134     // Ywires
00135     if ((par >= 4051) && (par <= (4050+kMuPC1NumYWires))) {
00136       int wire = (par-4050);
00137       // tdiffs between successive Ywire hits, per wire
00138       if (prev_hit_index_muPC1_Ywire[wire] >= 0) {
00139         muPC1_Ywire_successive_tdiffs->Fill((hit_bank[i].time -
00140                                              hit_bank[prev_hit_index_muPC1_Ywire[wire]].time),
00141                                             wire);
00142       }
00143       prev_hit_index_muPC1_Ywire[wire] = i;
00144       // 2D Ywire hits vs. time
00145       //      muPC1_YwireVStime_2D->Fill(hit_bank[i].time, wire);
00146     }
00147   }
00148 
00149   /* ############################################### */
00150 
00151   return SUCCESS;
00152 }
